    • Method Detail

      • createDashboard

        public  createDashboard(Dashboard dashboard)
                      throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        POST /dashboards : Create a new dashboard.
        Parameters:
        dashboard - the dashboard to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new dashboard, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the dashboard has already an ID
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • updateDashboard

        public  updateDashboard(Dashboard dashboard)
                      throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        PUT /dashboards : Updates an existing dashboard.
        Parameters:
        dashboard - the dashboard to update
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated dashboard, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the dashboard is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the dashboard couldnt be updated
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • getAllDashboards

        public java.util.List<Dashboard> getAllDashboards()
        GET /dashboards : get all the dashboards.
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of dashboards in body

      • getDashboardsByPhase

        public java.util.List<Dashboard> getDashboardsByPhase(java.lang.Long id)

      • getDashboard

        public  getDashboard(java.lang.Long id)
        GET /dashboards/:id : get the "id" dashboard.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the dashboard to retrieve
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the dashboard, or with status 404 (Not Found)

      • deleteDashboard

        public  deleteDashboard(java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE /dashboards/:id : delete the "id" dashboard.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the dashboard to delete
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK)
